title: KRK Threatens To Sue Marvel For Using His Name 'Kamala Khan' Without 'Permission', Gets Trolled
text:
KRK Threatens To Sue Marvel For Using His Name 'Kamala Khan' Without 'Permission', Gets Trolled

KRK Threatens To Sue Marvel For Using His Name 'Kamala Khan' Without 'Permission', Gets Trolled

Remember KRK? The ex-controversial Bigg Boss contestant who has infamously gained a celebrity status just because of his foul mouth and irresponsible tweets? The self-proclaimed movie critic often takes a dig at several celebrities and calls them out for mostly absurd reasons. This time, he is making headlines for calling out Marvel.

Twitter

KRK took to Twitter recently to pose a threat against Marvel. Why? Because he thinks that Marvel has taken inspiration from his name to name one of its characters as Kamala Khan. KRK, whose full name is Kamaal Rashid Khan, wants to sue Marvel.

mouthshut.com

“Please note @Marvel officials, you can’t use my name #kamalakhan without my permission. You can’t just add an A and get away. You should take permission from me or I will go to court against you,” he wrote on Twitter.

Don't Miss 4 K SHARES 1.4 K SHARES 1.6 K SHARES 1 K SHARES 2.3 K SHARES

Please note @Marvel officials, you can’t use my name #kamalakhan without my permission. You can’t just add an A and get away. You should take permission from me or I will go to court against you. pic.twitter.com/kAaHCuBBRz — KRK (@kamaalrkhan) October 5, 2019

This tweet came after Marvel introduced Kamala Khan aka Ms Marvel on a couple of days ago.

And the trolling began almost immediately.

Bhai tere se jyada to tiktok ke londe famous hai...😂😂😜 — Aarnav Sharma (@sunilaarnav) October 5, 2019

Confuse हूँ की कौन कौन सी गाली दू। शब्द कम पड़ जाएंगे आज इस चूतियापे पर। — Rocky (@Rockyji98) October 6, 2019

AahThoo 😂😂 — cruise84 (@cruise842) October 6, 2019

For the unversed, Mr Marvel alias Kamala Khan is Pakistan-origin first ever Muslim Marvel superhero. A film on the character is reportedly in the works. When the news was announced that Marvel is planning to make a standalone movie on the character, fans, particularly Indians, expressed their desire to see our Desi Girl Priyanka Chopra play the role.

At the New York Comic Con recently, a game based on the character of Ms Marvel alias Kamala Khan was introduced in which she is a playable character. She will attempt to put the Avengers team back together. Marvel fans were happy to see her in the game. Take a look at the trailer below.
